title: Yaaradi Nee Lyrics From Jarugandi 2018 Film
stanzas:
yaaradi nee, naanaaga
adi kaalam kaiyil
varume, thaanaaga.
Pogum vazhi, poovaaga
Ini kaatril mithappen
Naanum noolaaga.
Yaarovaaga ninaithn
Poove unakkaai kaninthen
Theevin naduvil
Maramaai naan iruppen.

Oaivaai paravai irukka
Uravaai siragai virikka
Aalakadalil padagaa
Iravin nilavu nee ..

Pudhupudhu mazhaigalai alli
Mazhaigalum kuzhithidume
Uravindri valarkindra vembil
Panai vandhu mulaithidume.

Chuda chuda sooriyan kandu
Ulagamum thulirthidume
Nagarkindra megangal pole
Thuyarangal nagarndhidume.

O..ho.. vaanathin thaaragai
Vaasal thedi vandhathe.
Vaadhaigal thooramaai
Oadi poguthe.

Adi thaagangal theernthu nee
Saaindhu kollum velaiyil.
Thoothanai polave vandhen
Thaangi kollave.

Kannukkul achchangal neengattume
Kaatrinil thendralum neenthattume.
Nammodu kaalangal serattume.
Ondrodu ondraaga maarattume.

Oru vazhi thirkkindra podhu
Maruvazhi adaikindratheno.
Maruvazhi adaikindratheno
Oru vazhi thiranthidumthaane.
Thiranthidum ....
Yaaradi nee
Yaaradi nee
Yaaradi nee

Pudhupudhu mazhaigalai alli
Mazhaigalum kuzhithidume
Uravindri valarkindra vembil
Panai vandhu mulaithidume.

Chuda chuda sooriyan kandu
Ulagamum thulirthidume
Nagarkindra megangal pole
Thuyarangal nagarndhidume.

seo.description: Get the complete Yaaradi Nee Lyrics From Jarugandi 2018 Film Read the lyrics penned by Uma Devi and composed by Bobo Shashi and sung by Yuvan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Uma Devi, Bobo Shashi, Yuvan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
